channel.title: Tutorials on LexicMap: efficient sequence alignment against millions of prokaryotic genomes​
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on LexicMap: efficient sequence alignment against millions of prokaryotic genomes​

item.title: Searching
item.description: Table of contents Table of contents TL;DR Input Hardware requirements Algorithm Parameters Steps Output Alignment result relationship Output format Examples TL;DR Build a LexicMap index. Run: For short queries like genes or long reads, returning top N hits. lexicmap search -d db.lmi query.fasta -o query.fasta.lexicmap.tsv \ --min-qcov-per-hsp 70 --min-qcov-per-genome 70 --top-n-genomes 1000 For longer queries like plasmids, returning all hits. lexicmap search -d db.lmi query.fasta -o query.fasta.lexicmap.tsv \ --min-qcov-per-hsp 0 --min-qcov-per-genome 0 --top-n-genomes 0 Input Query length
